price: ពេលនោះអ្នកនឹងឃើញមនុស្សម្នាចូលសាសនារបស់ អល់ឡោះទាំងក្រុមៗ។
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
